field.name: description
field.value:
Using the non-deprecated RenderMailMessage methods, AspView will not successfully render a mail message because the context is null. Related to MR-522, but instantiating a new DictionaryAdapterFactory is only half the problem.
In AspViewEngine.cs, the last line for Process(string, string, TextWriter, IDictionary) can be changed to
Process(templateName, output, EngineContextLocator.Instance.LocateCurrentContext(), null, controllerContext);
in order to fix the problem.
